author: Sam Haysom
title: John Oliver tears down every move Trump's made in his coronavirus response
description: John Oliver has been covering the new coronavirus for almost a month now, tracking its spread across three detailed videos. And while he touched on Trump's response to the pandemic last time around, he really lets the president have it in his latest video — b…
content:
John Oliver has been covering the new coronavirus for almost a month now, tracking its spread across three detailed videos.
